text:
Innolitics | NYC, Austin, Houston | REMOTE | Full-time

We are a small (but growing), all-remote software development firm. Most of our clients are in the medical imaging space. We have a close-knit team of developers and engineers, and we love working together to solve challenging problems for our clients. We are looking to hire a software developer to work on medical imaging projects using Python and basic web technologies.

See details @ http://innolitics.com/join/python-developer-april-2016/
